articles.description: The A-League season will restart as planned with Fox Sports on board but as always with the game in Australia, nothing is ever simple
articles.content: Lets begin with some cognitive dissonance. Fridays announcement that the 2019-20 A-League season will recommence as planned and the 2020-21 campaign will remain on Fox Sports is, in these extraordina… [+5086 chars]

articles.author: Sam Phillips
articles.title: 'He absolutely flogged me': Moylan recalls DWZ bell-ringer - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The man on the wrong end of the tackle of the season has no qualms with his former Penrith teammate.
articles.content:
The Cronulla playmaker could see the funny side of the shot he received post-match, revealing his former Penrith teammate actually apologised moments after folding the 29-year-old in half.
"It was a… [+1838 chars]

articles.title: Liverpool’s scary room for improvement will leave rivals stunned: PL talking points - Fox Sports
articles.description: As the first full weekend on Premier League action came to an end, we found that Liverpool have plenty of room for improvement - which will be sure to scare the rest of the league - and it is time for Paul Pogba to live up to the hype.
